@JaimeAndrsGlve1 Mine are 9:00 to 12:00 and 19:00 to midnight... Not a morning person.

"For ages, humans have had an evolving obsession with time... In our pursuit for precise timepieces, we abandoned nature’s cues...—in hopes of possessing time with great precision in timekeeping. But time is not something that can be possessed." https://t.co/5Sf8gnhQtu

@nsikan2 @realpython So far is sharing a little bit of my experience learning soft development at Holberton school ... and I try to share resources that have been very useful to me for each topic. We started with C and now we are with Python while we’re digging deeper into Computer Science concepts.
Votes come to me! https://t.co/XjWReb4Q0W

@vectary is an online 3D modeling tool with which you can create, share, and customize 3D designs for web, AR, or VR. You can share your project with a link, just as you would share a Google doc.

Day 11 - #100DaysOfCode Exceptions, ... try/except, raise, unpacking arguments in Python. I have to admit that #pythoniscool handling errors and exception cases...
